titleStmt.title: An Electronic Edition Mishnah Sheqalim, S000127856

Lieberman Institute; Primary Witnesses to Tannaitic Literature

note.p: Mishnah text, extracted from the Ms. Munich Cod. hebr. 205 Bayerische Staatsbibliothek as published in .
This manuscript is a manuscript of Midrash Hashkem/Midrash Ve-Hizhir. In the absence of a catalog number in the Sussmann Catalog, we use the system number in NLI.

Based on a transcription by Katrin Jansen, Matthias Lehmann, Gerold Necker und Gert Wildensee, last revision by Hans-Jürgen Becker. Responsibility by Peter Schäfer, Hans-Jürgen Becker. Converted to TEI by Gottfried Reeg using TUSCRIPT

revisionDesc.change: Sample transcription and markup of Bava Metsia Ch. 2
